data.text: Pen Lom bɨ chɨm kadɨŋ gep bɨawl olap, taun Sisaliya yolɨgup. Yɨb ne ak Koniliyus. Ne bɨ chɨm kadɨŋ gep kod yolɨgup okok, kɨlop Yitali bɨ chɨm kadɨŋ gep okok agelɨgɨpal.

10.2 Apo 8.2, 10.22, 10.35, 22.12 Bɨawl Koniliyus anɨb ak, binɨb kal nop ap yelɨgɨpal okok ayɨp, God nop gos nɨŋɨd kɨdek gelɨgɨpal. Ne Juda binɨb yɨmgeptek okok, kɨlop mani tap okok monmon ñolɨgup. Pen ne God nop mɨnek mɨnek agolɨgup.
10.3 Apo 3.1, 10.30, 11.13 Mɨnek olap sub kɨyum gak won ak, day nɨgak, God ensel olap agyokek apɨl agak, Koniliyus agak.
Agek, nop nɨŋɨjsek lɨg pɨlɨkɨlɨg agak, Bɨawl. Yɨp taynen agak?
Nad bɨ ogɨnap age, am taun Jopa amɨl, bɨ Saymon Pita apal ak nop am agel ownɨmuŋ agak.
10.6 Apo 9.43 Ne bɨ olap ayɨp mɨdebil, ñɨg solwala gol ak agak. Bɨ olap anɨb ak, yɨb ne abe Saymon, bɨ chag bulmakaw wak wog golɨgup agak.

Pen ensel ak takaw anɨb ak agɨl amnaknɨŋ, Koniliyus ne bɨ wog gɨñeb ne omɨŋal ak sek, bɨ chɨm kadɨŋ gep God nop gos nɨgak olap sek agek owlak. Bɨ chɨm kadɨŋ gep anɨb ak, ne Koniliyus ayɨp mɨdɨl, nop wog gɨñɨtep golɨgup.
Apelak, ensel ak takaw tɨtay agak ak kɨlop agñɨ tep gɨl, agyokek taun Jopa amnɨg saŋɨdɨlak.
Am am kanɨb nab ak kɨnɨlak. Mɨnek am am, subnab awl alaŋ won ak, taun Jopa wulep wulep gɨlak. Won anɨb ak Pita, God nop agɨnɨg amnak, kal adek alaŋ.
Amɨl, God nop ag mɨdaknɨŋ, nop yuwan gak. Pen binɨb ne okok, tap dagɨl gɨlaknɨŋ, ne day nɨgak.
10.11 Apo 11.5-17 Day nɨŋɨd nɨgak, wɨsɨp alaŋ mɨgan yɨkɨl, tap olap wad awl tek ak alaŋ nɨb lum ayaŋ owak.
Wad mɨgan anɨb ak sab chag, yawl, yoy okok keke kuŋay yɨbɨl yek.
Takaw olap pen agak, Pita. Tɨkjakɨl tap ñɨŋeb anɨb pi okok pak ñɨŋan agak.
10.14 Wkp 11.1-47, Lo 14.3, 14.7, Ese 4.14 Agek pen agak, Bɨawl, mel agak. Chɨn Juda binɨb tap asɨŋ anɨb okok yad ma ñɨbin agak. Tap olap ñɨben, wɨdɨn mɨdup nak adek sɨŋak tep ma gup agak.
10.15 Mat 15.11, Mak 7.15, 7.19, Apo 10.28, Lom 14.14-20, 1 Ko 10.25 Agek, takaw anɨb ak tepayaŋ agak, God tap tɨtay gek suŋ mɨdeb okok, tap asɨkep agɨl ma agɨnɨmɨn agak.
Day nɨgak anɨb ak, tepayaŋ nɨŋɨd tepayaŋ nɨŋɨd tepayaŋ nɨŋɨd gak. Won anɨb anep tap wad awl anɨb ak, adɨkɨd wɨsɨp alaŋ amnak.
Anɨgek, Pita day nepin anɨb ak tay gɨnɨgab agɨl, gos kuŋay nɨgak. Nɨg mɨdaknɨŋ, bɨ Koniliyus agyokek nop agnɨg owlak bɨ kab ak, kanɨbtub ak amjakɨlak.
Amjakɨl agɨlak, Bɨ Saymon, yɨb ne olap Pita apal ak, awl mɨdeb akaŋ agɨlak?
Pen Pita ne day anɨb ak nɨg yek, God Kawnan ak Pita nop agak, Bɨ omɨŋal nokom apɨl nep pɨyowebal agak.
Yad ke agen nep pɨyowebal anɨb ak, kɨlop gos kuŋay ma nɨgɨnɨmɨn agak. Tɨkjakɨl, ayaŋ amɨl, kɨli ayɨp amnɨmɨb agak.
Agek, ayaŋ amɨl kɨlop nɨŋɨd anɨb agak, Bɨ pɨyow nɨgebɨm ak nɨm, yad nokom agak. Yɨp takaw olap agɨnɨg opɨm akaŋ agak?

10.22 Apo 10.1-2, 22.12 Agek agɨlak, Bɨawl Koniliyus, Lom bɨ chɨm kadɨŋ gep bɨawl olap, ne chɨnop agyokek opun agɨlak. Ne bɨ teplep yɨbɨl, God nop gos nɨŋɨd kɨdek gek, Juda kay nop nɨgel tep gup agɨlak. God ensel ne olap apɨl nop agak, Nad bɨ ogɨnap agyoke, am Saymon Pita nop poŋɨd apel, takaw agɨnɨmuŋ ak nɨgɨnɨmɨb agak agɨlak.

Anɨb agel, Pita kɨlop agek kal mɨgan amɨl kɨnɨlak. Mɨnek Pita ayɨp, bɨ Jopa nɨb Jisas nop gos lɨnɨgɨlak ogɨnap ayɨp, Koniliyus agyokak bɨ tun ak ayɨp amnɨlak. Am am kanɨb nab ak kɨnɨlak. Mɨnek nɨm, taun Sisaliya amjakɨl, Koniliyus kal ak amnɨlak.
Pen Koniliyus ne Pita apeb agɨl, binɨb ne okok sek, numi nɨmam ne okok sek kɨlop suk agek apnan gɨl yelak.
Pita amɨl, kal mɨgan amnɨg gaknɨŋ, Koniliyus nop tep gak. Anɨgek, Koniliyus am tob agen amɨl, kɨgom yɨm gɨlɨg, Pita yɨb nop ak dad aplanak.
10.26 Apo 14.13-15, Lep 19.10 Anɨgek, Pita nop dɨ jakñɨl agak, Jakan. Yad God mel, yad bɨ yokɨp nen agak.
Agek jakaknɨŋ, takaw agɨlɨg kal mɨgan ayaŋ amnɨlek. Amɨl, Pita nɨgak, binɨb kuŋay yɨbɨl apnan gɨl yelak.

10.28 Jon 4.9, Apo 15.8-9, Gal 2.12-14, Epe 3.6 Nɨŋɨd, kɨlop agak, Nɨbi ke nepɨm, chɨn Juda okok, binɨb Juda mel ogɨnap ayɨp yonɨgun tek ma lup agak. Kal kɨli binɨb Juda mel okok wɨlɨkɨl ayɨp ma yonɨgun tek lup agak. Pen God yɨp takaw olap agak ak nɨm, binɨb ogɨnap asɨŋ mɨdebal agɨl, kɨlop asɨkɨnɨm tek ma lup agak.
Anɨb ak nɨŋɨd nɨm, Koniliyus takaw agup ak nɨŋɨd ma kelɨgɨpin, agup tek nɨŋɨd opin agak. Anɨb ak yɨp tay gɨnɨg agem opin agak?

Pita anɨb agek, Koniliyus agak, Yad bɨ anɨb okok nep agyokɨpin ñɨn anɨb ak, nab sɨŋawl sub kɨyum gak won awl tek, kal mɨgan ayaŋ God nop ag mɨdɨlɨg nɨgɨnek, bɨ chech kayɨg yɨbɨl yɨmak olap, apɨl yenek sɨŋak mɨseŋ lak agak.
10.31 Dan 10.12, Hib 6.10 Gɨl agak, Koniliyus. Nad God nop agɨlɨg, mani tap okok binɨb yɨmgeptek okok kɨlop monmon ñɨban ak, God nɨgup agak.

Anɨb ak nɨm, bɨ ogɨnap agyoke, taun Jopa amɨl, bɨ Saymon yɨb nop olap Pita apal ak, poŋɨd ownɨgel agak. Ne bɨ olap ayɨp mɨdebil, ñɨg solwala gol ak agak. Bɨ olap anɨb ak, yɨb ne abe Saymon, bɨ chag bulmakaw wak wog golɨgup agak.
Ensel ak yɨp anɨb agek, yad kasek bɨyad ogɨnap agen, nep am poŋɨd apel nɨm, yɨp tep gup agak. Kal awl God ayɨp mɨdobun tek, takaw mɨdupsek kɨlop agɨnɨmɨn agɨl nep agup ak, chɨnop age nɨgun agak.
Koniliyus anɨb agek, Pita agak, Yad mɨñɨl nepin. God chɨnop Juda binɨb nep din agɨl gos ak ma nɨgup agak. Binɨb man okok mɨdupsek dɨnɨgab agak.
10.35 Jon 9.31, Lom 2.13, 1 Ko 12.13, Gal 3.28, Epe 3.6 Man okok mɨdupsek, binɨb nop gos nɨŋɨd muk ne okok apɨl gɨtep yɨbɨl gɨnɨgabal okok, kɨlop dɨnɨgab agak.

10.36 Sng 107.20, Ais 52.7, 57.19, Mat 28.18, Lom 10.12, Lep 17.14 Pen God chɨnop Yislel binɨb dɨnɨg, takaw teplep agak ak nepɨm agak. Takaw anɨb ak anɨgɨl agñɨlak, God ne chɨn ayɨp kɨmɨgel mɨdon agɨl, Jisas Klays nop agyokek owak agɨlak agak. Jisas ne Bɨawl ak, chɨnop mɨdupsek kod mɨdeb agɨlak agak.

10.37-38 Mat 3.16, 4.12-17, Luk 4.14, 4.17-20, Jon 3.2, Hib 1.9 Tap anɨb anɨb gak ak man Yislel, bɨ ogɨnap agel nepɨm agak. Ned Jon Bɨ Ñɨg Pakñeb ak ñɨg pakñɨlɨg, takaw tep agñak agak. Kɨdek, tap anɨb okok jɨj gɨl gak, Galili plopens agak. Bɨ Jisas taun Nasalet nɨb, God ayɨp mɨdɨl nop aglup ak, God ne Kawnan ne ak Jisas nop yokek kod yek agak. Ne man okok ajɨl, binɨb yokɨp okok dɨtep gɨlɨg, binɨb kɨcheki bɨawl ak gek koslam yelak okok kɨlop gek, suŋ lak agak. Anɨgek, takaw anɨb ak ag dad amɨl, ag dad amɨl, binɨb Judiya mɨdebal okok mɨdupsek nɨgɨlak agak.
Pen Jisas, ne chɨn Juda binɨb man okok gɨ ajɨl, taun Jelusalem gɨ ajɨl gak gak tek, chɨn ke nɨgɨnok tek agebin agak. Nop mab bak alaŋ chɨpɨl pak tɨbɨk lel kumak ak pen,
10.40 Apo 2.24, 1 Ko 15.4-7 ñɨn omɨŋal nokom mɨdɨl, God gek tepayaŋ tɨkjakɨl, apɨl mɨseŋ lek nɨgɨnok agak.

10.41 Luk 24.42-43, Jon 14.17-24, 15.27, Apo 1.8, 13.31 Binɨb mɨdupsek nop ma nɨgɨlak agak. God chɨnop binɨb ne aglup okok nep, nop yomek mɨseŋ nɨgɨnok agak. Chɨn nɨm ne kumɨl tɨkjakɨl, ayɨp jɨmñɨl tap ñɨŋɨnok agak.

10.42 Mat 28.19-20, Apo 17.31, Lom 14.9-10, 2 Ko 5.10, 2 Ti 4.1, 1 Pi 4.5 Chɨnop agak, Takaw tep yad ak binɨb okok kɨlop agñɨtep gɨlɨg agɨnɨmɨb agak. Kɨdek God agek, bɨ aglup nokom nɨm ak, binɨb kumɨlak okok sek, binɨb kɨm yenɨgabal okok sek, kɨlop mɨdupsek tɨg asɨk bɨlokɨnɨgab agak.

10.43 Ais 33.24, 53.5-6, 53.11, Jer 31.34, Dan 9.24, Mai 7.18, Sek 13.1, Lom 10.11, Gal 3.22 Pen adek anɨb ak, bɨ God gos ñek agñeb okok mɨdupsek agɨlak, Klays ne apɨl gɨnɨgab tek, binɨb nop gos lɨnɨgɨnɨgabal okok, God kɨlop mɨdupsek tap si tap tɨmel gɨpal ak tɨg walɨg gɨyokɨnɨgab agɨlak agak.
Pen Pita anɨgɨl takaw ag mɨdaknɨŋ, binɨb mɨdupsek takaw anɨb ak nɨgɨlak okok, God Kawnan ak kɨlop bak lak.

10.45-46 Apo 2.4, 10.23, 11.18, 19.6, Gal 3.14 Bak lek, takaw yɨbɨl keke agɨlɨg, God yɨb nop ak dad aplanɨlak. Anɨgelak, bɨ Juda Jisas nop gos lɨnɨŋɨd, Pita ayɨp owlak okok, kɨli judɨl nɨŋɨd anɨb agɨlak, God ne Kawnan ne ak, binɨb Juda mel okol kɨlop monmon yokek apɨl bak lup agɨlak. Pita pen agak,
10.47 Apo 8.36, 11.17, 15.8-9, Lom 10.12 God Kawnan ne ak chɨnop yokak tek, mɨñɨl binɨb okol kɨlop abe yokup agak. Anɨb ak ñɨg pakɨnɨg agel, binɨb ogɨnap kɨlop mel agɨnɨgel tek ma lup agak.
10.48 Apo 2.38 Anɨb agɨl, bɨne ogɨnap agek, Jisas yɨl mɨdebal agɨl, kɨlop ñɨg pakñɨlak. Pakñelak agɨlak, Pita. Ñɨn kab olap chɨn ayɨp yenɨmɨn agɨlak.
